item.title: A new Map...
item.dc:creator: Tbo_Waffles
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

Just a little bit, thatll ‘fine’ it up so to speak.

Add clutter, thats what i like to call it, just don’t go overboard.

(Pic #2)
added hdr looks nicer, although light intensity is well… to intense, dull it down a bit.

(Pic #3)
Steps on right hand side building reduce in size and chuck a few more in there.
Maybe chuck a bench in there to, considering its like a nice little area.

(sorry can i ask first picture, 17fps?)

Thanks for the tips
As for the 17 fps is because i had CSS run in window and used the Snaping tool from windows 7 to take the pic. So Bascially i wasnt playing the Game

IDK hard to explain lol

Read full topic

item.title: A new Map...
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
It looks pretty nice, I can’t think of any constructive criticism atm.

Edit; Here’s something small. On the second pic, I think it’d look better if you put some rails on each side of the grates. Oh, and put wires between all of the lights in the second pic.
